metadata.shortInfo: Red boxes indicate regions where there are more than 2 times as many forward sense RNASeq reads aligned to the genome as reverse sense reads.

style.label: function(f) {var score = f.get('score'); if(typeof score === undefined) {return 'no score'; } return 'Score: '+score;}
style.height: function (f) {var score = f.get('score'); var h = Math.floor(score/2); if (score > 100) {h = 50;} if (h == 0 || h == 1) {h=2;} return h; }
style.color: function(f) {var source = f.get('source'); if (source == 'RNASeq_R_asymmetry') {return 'red';} if (source == 'RNASeq_F_asymmetry') {return 'green';} return 'black';  }

onClick.label: Feature in WormBase
onClick.content: function(track,f) {var wburl = ''; var name = f.get('name'); return 'this doesnt appear to work '+wburl+'/get?name='+name+';class=Feature'; }
onClick.title: Feature in WormBase
